title: Lowca Beck
text:
Lowca Beck is a <a href="beck%20%28stream%29">beck</a> in the <a href="English%20county">county</a> of <a href="Cumbria">Cumbria</a>, <a href="England">England</a>.
The beck rises (as Distington Beck) in the vicinity of Gilgarran and flows by <a href="Distington">Distington</a> and the remains of <a href="Hayes%20Castle">Hayes Castle</a> before flowing between <a href="Lowca">Lowca</a> and <a href="Howgate%2C%20Cumbria">Howgate</a>, emptying into the <a href="Solway%20Firth">Solway Firth</a> at <a href="Parton%20Bay">Parton Bay</a>.
